    • Uses of PIPFinder in com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.finders

      Classes in com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.finders that implement PIPFinder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConfigurableEngineFinder
      ConfigurableEngineFinder extends EngineFinder with a method for configuring it from a Properties object.
      class  EngineFinder
      EngineFinder implements the PIPFinder interface by maintaining a simple list of registered PIPEngine objects.
      class  RequestFinder
      RequestFinder implements the PIPFinder interface by wrapping another PIPFinder a RequestEngine and a EnvironmentEngine.
      class  WrappingFinder
      WrappingFinder implements PIPFinder by wrapping another PIPFinder to intercept calls to getAttributes and do some other processing before calling it on the wrapped PIPFinder.
      Methods in com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.finders with parameters of type PIPFinder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PIPResponse WrappingFinder.getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude, PIPFinder pipFinderParent) 
      PIPResponse EngineFinder.getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude, PIPFinder pipFinderParent) 
      PIPResponse WrappingFinder.getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude, PIPFinder pipFinderParent) 
      PIPResponse EngineFinder.getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude, PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
